permissions: Requires authorization to update prediction subject bids via the delegated LowestLosingBidPredictionSubjectDetail policy.
side_effects: Updates fields on an existing prediction subject bid.
validation_notes: Requires a prediction subject bid ID argument. At least one updatable field must be provided; use --amount. Amount must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --amount
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.
